pullrequest.title: Update animate joint tutorial for atlas v4 v5

content.raw:
It is working for me. However I found a bit confusing our current split into v4v5 and the rest (I assume v3). Several ideas to improve:

 * Remove the script for version 3 is we are not going to maintain support for that atlas version
 * Tell the user in the section "Create a ROS publisher" that this code is only going to work with atlas v3 and include a link to section for v4v5.
 * Assuming that v4/v5 are going to be the most used versions, flip the code: move the v4v5 code to the main tutorial sections and create for v3 a separate chapter like the current one for Atlasv4v5.
content.html:
It is working for me. However I found a bit confusing our current split into v4v5 and the rest (I assume v3). Several ideas to improve:

  • Remove the script for version 3 is we are not going to maintain support for that atlas version
  • Tell the user in the section "Create a ROS publisher" that this code is only going to work with atlas v3 and include a link to section for v4v5.
  • Assuming that v4/v5 are going to be the most used versions, flip the code: move the v4v5 code to the main tutorial sections and create for v3 a separate chapter like the current one for Atlasv4v5.

content.raw:
fixed isue with new script `joint_animation_v4v5.py` script

had to set pid values to 0, switch to `ragdoll` mode then `User` mode for joint trajectory control to work.
content.html:
fixed isue with new script joint_animation_v4v5.py script

had to set pid values to 0, switch to ragdoll mode then User mode for joint trajectory control to work.
